Description.Text: Situated on eclectic and restaurant-rich upper Broadway on New York's Upper West Side, The Marrakech Hotel offers visitors the chance to live like real New Yorkers. Over 50 fine, moderately-priced neighborhood restaurants are within a five-block radius of the hotel. Also nearby is Grant's Tomb, overlooking Riverside Park and the world's largest Gothic cathedral, the magnificent Cathedral of St. John the Divine.
• Riverside Park – 2 blocks • Central Park – 4 blocks • Museum of the City of New York – 8 blocks • Museum of Natural History – 1 mile

Recently renovated (November 2006) guestrooms at the Marrakech Hotel have down duvets and European bed linens. The complimentary toiletries are made by Ecco. The guestrooms are furnished with coffeemakers, hair dryers, and CD players. The bathrooms have showers only.

The Marrakech Hotel's bright and cheery rooms feature a modern design, television, daily maid service and air conditioning. The Marrakech Hotel is located on the Upper West Side of Manhattan, close to shops, restaurants, and night clubs. The hotel offers wireless Internet access in public areas for a surcharge; the front desk is open 24 hours a day. The hotel has a bar and lounge on site. Business services and concierge services are available, and the lobby has a fireplace. Parking is available nearby. The hotel offers tour assistance.
• Pets not allowed • Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is 11 AM

Driving directions from LaGuardia Airport: Bear left at Central Terminal Dr. Bear right into the Parkway West entry ramp to Manhattan. Merge onto Grand Central Pkwy west. Continue on I-278 east. Take the exit to Manhattan/Randalls-Wards Is/Downing Stadium. Bear right at Triborough Bridge. Take the FDR Dr south ramp. Take Exit 14 to East 96th St. Bear left at FDR Dr. Turn right at East 96th St. Turn right at Madison Ave. Turn left at E 97th St. Turn right at Broadway.

Kazbar Lounge - Serves cocktails, wines, and a tapas menu. Open daily. This hotel does not have a restaurant, but there are several dining options in the surrounding area. Nearby restaurants include: Royal Kebab & Curry Mama Mexico Cafe du Soleil Broadway Pizza and Restaurant Ming's Wok
